Serialized Form

  • Package com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice

    • Class com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.AnnotationService extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • cfgToAnnotatorBundle

          HashMap<K,V> cfgToAnnotatorBundle
          Map of annotator bundles, indexed by their configuration.

    • Class com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.ExecuteParams extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      2377005342364764026L

      • Serialized Fields

        • timeoutMS

          Long timeoutMS
          Timeout value in milliseconds that the annotator is allowed to spend on a single document before being interrupted; by default, it is AnnotationServiceConstants.NO_TIMEOUT

        • langCodeValue

          String langCodeValue
          2-letter language code of the input document; used for all text fields of the input document; this field and the langCodeFieldName field are mutually exclusive; specifying non-null values for both these fields results in an exception

        • langCodeFieldName

          String langCodeFieldName
          Field name on the input document that contains the 2-letter language code of all fields of the input document; this field and the langCodeValue attribute are mutually exclusive; specifying non-null values for both these fields results in an exception

        • contentTypeValue

          String contentTypeValue
          Content type of the input document text as one of the two values: 'text/plain' and 'text/html'; used for all text fields of the input document; this field and the contentTypeFieldName field are mutually exclusive: specifying non-null values for both of them results in an exception

        • contentTypeFieldName

          String contentTypeFieldName
          field name on the input document that contains the content type of the input document text as one of the two values: 'text/plain' and 'text/html'; this field and the contentTypeValue field are mutually exclusive: specifying non-null values for both of them results in an exception

  • Package com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.exceptions

    • Class com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.exceptions.AnnotationServiceException extends Exception implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

    • Class com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.exceptions.JSONException extends AnnotationServiceException implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

    • Class com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.exceptions.JSONException.UnexpectedField extends JSONException implements Serializable

    • Class com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.exceptions.JSONException.WrongType extends JSONException implements Serializable

    • Class com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.exceptions.VerboseNullPointerException extends AnnotationServiceException implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

  • Package com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.models.json

    • Class com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.models.json.AnnotatorBundleConfig extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • version

          String version
          The version of the configuration format, e.g., "1.0"

        • annotator

          HashMap<K,V> annotator
          The annotator identifier; a record with two fields key and version, both of type String

        • annotatorRuntime

          String annotatorRuntime
          The text analytics runtime for executing this annotator, e.g., SystemT, UIMA, SIRE

        • acceptedContentTypes

          List<E> acceptedContentTypes
          The input types accepted by this annotator, e.g., "text/plain"

        • inputTypes

          List<E> inputTypes
          The input types expected by this annotator

        • outputTypes

          List<E> outputTypes
          The output types produced by this annotator

        • location

          String location
          Directory on HDFS or local FS where the annotator bundle has been deployed.

        • serializeAnnotatorInfo

          boolean serializeAnnotatorInfo
          True to serialize the annotator info (including the key and the version) inside each output annotation (i.e., the value of AnnotatorBundleConfig.getAnnotator() is copied to each output annotation); if not specified, the default is false (no serialization)

        • serializeSpan

          String serializeSpan
          The type of span serialization

    • Class com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.models.json.SystemTAnnotatorBundleConfig extends AnnotatorBundleConfig implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • moduleNames

          List<E> moduleNames
          For SystemT annotators, the set of modules to instantiate for this annotator as a JSON Array of Strings, where each string is a module name

        • modulePath

          List<E> modulePath
          For SystemT annotators, the module path for this annotator as an array of String values, where each String is a HDFS URI pointing to a directory, a .jar or .zip file containing compiled AQL modules (.tam files) Either this or *sourceModules* field is required.

        • sourceModules

          List<E> sourceModules
          For SystemT annotators, the AQL module path for this annotator as an array of String values, where each String points to a source AQL module directory, the path being relative to the value of location. Either this or *modulePath* field is required.

        • externalDictionaries

          HashMap<K,V> externalDictionaries
          For SystemT annotators, the external dictionaries used by this annotator, as a set of key value pairs, where the key is the AQL external dictionary name and the value is the location on HDFS of the dictionary file

        • externalTables

          HashMap<K,V> externalTables
          For SystemT annotators, the external tables used by this annotator, as a set of key value pairs, where the key is the AQL external stable name and the value is the location on HDFS of the corresponding CSV file with the table entries

        • tokenizer

          String tokenizer
          For SystemT annotators, the type of tokenizer used by the SystemT annotator, e.g., standard

        • tokenizerPearFile

          String tokenizerPearFile
          For SystemT annotators, the pearfile specifies the tokenizer

  • Package com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.util.file

    • Class com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.util.file.GPFSFileOperations extends Object implements Serializable

    • Class com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.util.file.HDFSFileOperations extends Object implements Serializable
